I confessed my feelings to her in this unhealthy atmosphere and I had to raise you, the child she didn't want to abort, the one of the animal in question that she let knock him up that day. Wow, that's a beautiful romance dad, or rather beautiful dad...

While these idiots don't even understand that their husbands don't care and that they will just lose a little more of their value because of the mangy dog that takes advantage of their weaknesses. Because they are the only ones who gain something in the end...  And the coward who doesn't even have the guts to take a hit or take out a bat to destroy a poor stain that likes to torment him, I don't even want to argue. I think he is the least guilty in this story, but honestly declaring yourself to such a girl after such a nasty story, what are you going to tell your kids? Toshi : (I was undecided, so your bitch of a mother gave the kind of thing we never forget, that is to say her precious first time to a man she didn't like and that I hated, all this "in front of my eyes" to try to make the cuckold that I am jealous and to push me to devote myself to her, when she was not even sure of my own feelings.

Then I would have ordered this slut with no self-esteem, who is worth less than a prostitute, to go hang herself on the spot for throwing away her dignity and doing something so vile to the man she claims to love. Trying to make a man jealous by giving his body without commitment to another man, who on top of that sees us only as a vulgar tool to satisfy his primary urges and this just in front of the boy we pretend to love in order to make him react, because he doesn't have enough confidence in himself to declare himself and we blame him for having pushed us to do such a thing is purely unforgivable. And the author claims that she has pride? You bet, she didn't hesitate for a second to let herself be soiled by a despicable man who has no respect for her... She's no better than those miserable, desperate women who go to bed with a stranger they meet on the street corner, just to try to make their cheating husbands jealous and get even.

Shit, I don't even know how people can be excited by such an abomination, unless they are a sub race in both cases! I was sick from the beginning to the end, impossible to get a hard-on... As if it was an example to follow for the youth... Three wastes of humanity gathered in the same room with two of them doing something they will regret all their lives. On one side we have the inferior primate, the one who deserves to be lynched to death in public. This vicious and megalomaniac animal in heat who has no shame in abusing the weakness of a poor promiscuous girl or in taking pleasure in the suffering of others... I would probably have ended up cutting his throat like the big pig he is, right after breaking his bones and smashing to bits with a hammer the little balls he doesn't even deserve to have.
